sentence: “Big Tech, Big Democrat Party, and Big Media all colluded to keep critical information from the American people in the run-up to the most important election we have, the presidential election, so we’re launching an investigation,” said Ranking Member Jim Jordan (R-OH) Thursday on Fox Business.
author: DML News App
title: NEWS ALERT: Judiciary GOP Investigating Facebook, Twitter for Suppressing Hunter Laptop
Will Elon Musk bring Trump back to Twitter?

author: Paul Bois
title: Elon Musk ‘Has Decided Not’ to Join Twitter’s Board of Directors
